post:
Continuing on the success of our previous LowEndBox and LowEndTalk offers, [QuickPacket](https://www.quickpacket.com) is pleased to offer our popular servers out of Charlotte, NC or Los Angeles, CA.

**CHARLOTTE, NC SPECIALS**

**SuperMicro - Intel Xeon E3-1270v2**

- Quad Core 3.5 GHz / 8 MB Cache / HyperThreading (8 Threads!)
- 16 GB RAM standard (upgrade to 32 GB RAM for an additional $20/month)
- 1 TB Serial ATA Hard Drive or 128 GB SSD
- 5 IP Addresses on Private VLAN with Reverse DNS
- Dedicated KVM over IP / IPMI
- 20 TB Bandwidth / 1 Gbps Port 
- Unmanaged
- Located in Charlotte, NC

**SAVE $74.99 - $35 per month! - USE PROMO CODE BF2017E3S1**
**[Click here to order now!](https://www.quickpacket.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=93&promocode=BF2017E3S1)**

**Dell or SuperMicro - Intel Dual Xeon L5520**

- Dual Quad Core 2.26 GHz / 2x 8 MB Cache / HyperThreading (16 Threads!)
- 24 GB RAM standard, up to 144 GB RAM for an additional fee
- 1 TB Serial ATA Hard Drive or 128 GB SSD
- 5 IP Addresses on Private VLAN with Reverse DNS
- /64 IPv6 Addresses upon request (More available with justification)
- Dedicated KVM over IP / IPMI (uses 1 IP address)
- 20 TB Bandwidth / 1 Gbps Port 
- Unmanaged
- Located in Charlotte, NC

**SAVE $14.99 - $35 per month! - COUPON CODE BF2017DXS2**
**[Click here to order now!](https://www.quickpacket.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=170&promocode=BF2017DXS2)**

**Dell or SuperMicro - Intel Dual Xeon L5639**

- Dual Hex Core 2.13 GHz / 2x 12 MB Cache / HyperThreading (24 Threads!)
- 24 GB RAM standard, up to 144 GB RAM for an additional fee
- 1 TB Serial ATA Hard Drive or 128 GB SSD
- 5 IP Addresses on Private VLAN with Reverse DNS
- /64 IPv6 Addresses upon request (More available with justification)
- Dedicated KVM over IP / IPMI (uses 1 IP address)
- 20 TB Bandwidth / 1 Gbps Port 
- Unmanaged
- Located in Charlotte, NC

**SAVE $29.99 - $40 per month! - USE PROMO CODE BF2017DXS3**
**[Click here to order now!](https://www.quickpacket.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=169&promocode=BF2017DXS3)**

**Intel Dual Xeon L5639 - Dell or SuperMicro**

- Dual Quad Core 2.13 GHz / 2x 12 MB Cache / HyperThreading (16 Threads!)
- 72 GB RAM standard, up to 144 GB RAM for an additional fee
- 1 TB Serial ATA Hard Drive or 128 GB SSD
- 5 IP Addresses on Private VLAN with Reverse DNS
- /64 IPv6 Addresses upon request (More available with justification)
- Dedicated KVM over IP / IPMI (uses 1 IP address)
- 20 TB Bandwidth / 1 Gbps Port 
- Unmanaged
- Located in Charlotte, NC

**SAVE $60.99 - $49 per month! - NO PROMO CODE REQUIRED**
**[Click here to order now!](https://www.quickpacket.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=190)**

**LOS ANGELES SPECIAL**

**SuperMicro - Intel Xeon E3-1270v2**

- Quad Core 3.5 GHz / 8 MB Cache / HyperThreading (8 Threads!)
- 16 GB RAM standard (upgrade to 32 GB RAM for an additional $20/month)
- 1 TB Serial ATA Hard Drive or 128 GB SSD
- 5 IP Addresses on Private VLAN with Reverse DNS
- Dedicated KVM over IP / IPMI
- 20 TB Bandwidth / 1 Gbps Port 
- Unmanaged
- Located in Los Angeles, CA

**SAVE $69.99 - $40 per month! - USE PROMO CODE BF2017E3S4**
**[Click here to order now!](https://www.quickpacket.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=161&promocode=BF2017E3S4)**

QuickPacket also offers a number of software licenses as add-ons:

- cPanel - VPS $11/month - Server $29.99/month
- KernelCare - $2/month
- CloudLinux - $9/month with cPanel, $11/month without
- Softaculous - VPS $1/month - Server $2/month
- WHMCS - Branded $12.80/month - Unbranded $14.80/month
- DirectAdmin - VPS $5/month - Server $9/month

Further details about QuickPacket and the promo offer:

- QuickPacket was founded in 2003 and is a registered LLC in North Carolina.
- Charlotte network providers include Zayo, GTT, and Cogent.  Los Angeles network providers include PCCW, GTT, and Cogent. ([AS46261](http://bgp.he.net/AS46261))
- Looking Glass/Test File: [Charlotte](http://lg.clt.quickpacket.com) | [Los Angeles](http://lg.lax.quickpacket.com)
- Charlotte servers are located in 125 N Myers St.  Los Angeles servers are located in 530 W 6th St.
- Warez-related, Bulk Mail, and Spam-related activities are strictly forbidden. Please review our [Terms of Service](http://www.quickpacket.com/tos.html) prior to ordering.
- We accept PayPal, VISA, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, Alipay (through Stripe) and Bitcoin (through BitPay) payments.
- Coupon code is mentioned above and is embedded in the order links provided. The discounted price will be reflected on the second page of the order form.
- Promotional pricing is available for new customers or existing customers adding additional servers. Promotional offers cannot be combined with other promotional offers.
- Please contact our sales department with any questions prior to ordering. 

Thanks for your interest!
